i1.name: Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard
i1.cooldown: {{tt|30 (On-Mount)|Cooldown begins on mounting-up and not when Skaarl flees away.}}
description: '''Kled''' is accompanied by his semi-trusty mount, '''Skaarl'''. Whether '''Kled''' is {{ai|Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard||mounted}} or {{ai|Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard 2||dismounted}}, his abilities are altered. '''Kled''' and '''Skaarl''' each have independent health bars with '''Skaarl''' being the only one benefiting from {{as|{{sti|health|'''bonus''' health}}}}.

{{sbc|Mounted – Innate:}} While mounted all damage dealt to the duo is suffered by '''Skaarl'''. After being reduced to {{as|{{sti|health|0 health}}}} '''Skaarl''' flees and '''Kled''' {{ai|Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard 2||dismounts}}, {{tip|cleanse|cleansing}} himself of all {{tip|crowd control}} and briefly becoming {{tip|untargetable}}, with every damage in excess of '''Skaarl's''' {{as|{{sti|health}}}} being ignored.

{{sbc|Dismounted – Innate:}} '''Kled''' has {{sti|health|{{as|{{pp|340+70*(x-1)*(0.7025+0.0175*(x-1))}} '''base''' health}}}}, gains {{sti|range|125 range}} but his {{sti|ms|{{as|'''base''' movement speed}}}} is reduced by 60. While moving towards enemy {{tip|champions}} within {{tt|900|estimated}} range he gains {{pp|100 to 185|color=ms}} {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} but his basic attacks against them deal {{as|80% AD}} damage. Additionally, he gains the ability to restore '''Skaarl's''' {{ai|Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard 3||Courage}} to {{ai|Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard||reunite}} again.

{{sbc|Courage - Innate:}} '''Kled''' restores 20 '''Courage''' whenever a champion he damaged dies within 3 seconds, 4 '''Courage''' for minion kills, 5 '''Courage''' when [[basic attack|basic attacking]] a structure or epic monster, and 15 '''Courage''' when basic attacking an enemy champion. At 100 '''Courage''', '''Skaarl''' returns to the fight with {{sti|health|{{as|{{pp|4|key=%|50 to 80|1 to 16}} of '''Skaarl's''' '''maximum''' health}}}}. While in base 25 '''Courage''' is regenerated every {{fd|0.25}} seconds. {{si|Recall|Returning to the base}} fully restores '''Skaarl's''' '''Courage''' and {{as|{{sti|health}}}}. If reuniting outside of base, '''Skaarl''' gets '''Frayed Nerves''', meaning '''Kled''' will not be able to restore '''Skaarl's''' '''Courage''' for a brief period of time.
{{ai|Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard||Mounting}} or {{ai|Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard 2||dismounting}} resets all of '''Kled's''' basic ability {{sti|cooldowns}} except for {{ai|Violent Tendencies|Kled}}.
i1.notes:
* [[Decoy]]s are counted as champions for all of this ability's effects, other than the takedown one.
* '''Kled's''' health is rounded up while '''Skaarl's''' is rounded down.
* The movement speed reduction is not affected by [[slow resist]].
* {{ii|Gargoyle Stoneplate}} can increase '''Kled's''' base health.
* It is possible to get the '''Courage''' from base but have '''Kled''' and '''Skaarl''' reunite out of base.
* It is possible for the [[Nexus Obelisk]] to not be able to bring '''Kled''' down from '''Skaarl''' for a few seconds, even if '''Skaarl''' has no health.
* Health regeneration only regenerates '''Kled's''' or '''Skaarl's''' health, and not both's.

q1.name: Beartrap on a Rope
description: {{sbc|{{ai|Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard||Mounted}} - Active:}} '''Kled''' hurls a beartrap tied to a piece of rope in the target direction, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies it passes through.

{{tip|minion|Minions}} and small {{tip|monster|monsters}} take 50% increased damage. The bear trap stops at the first enemy {{tip|champion}} or large monster hit, attaching to them. While attached, they are {{tip|true sight|revealed}}.

If '''Kled''' remains for {{fd|1.75}} seconds within a slowly decreasing radius of his target, he {{tip|airborne|pulls}} them {{tt|100|Estimated}}-units towards him, dealing {{as|physical damage}}, {{tip|Grievous Wounds|grievously wounding}} them by 60% for 5 seconds, and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
''Can be cast while {{ai|Jousting|Kled}}.''
q1.notes: * {{tip|Spell shield}} will block ''Beartrap on a Rope's'' initial throw, but not its subsequent damage or pull.

effects.levelingtext: {{st|Beartrap Physical Damage|{{ap|30 to 130}} {{as|(+ 60% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Minions and Small Monsters Damage|{{ap|30*1.5 to 130*1.5}} {{as|(+ 90% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
effects.str:
• Beartrap Physical Damage: (+ 60% bonus AD)
  • Minions and Small Monsters Damage: (+ 90% bonus AD)

effects.levelingtext:
{{st|Yank Physical Damage|{{ap|60 to 260}} {{as|(+ 120% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Total Damage|{{ap|30+60 to 130+260}} {{as|(+ 180% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
{{st|Slow|{{ap|40 to 60}}%}}
effects.str:
• Yank Physical Damage: (+ 120% bonus AD)
  • Total Damage: (+ 180% bonus AD)

  • Slow: %

q2.name: Pocket Pistol
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Kled''' periodically [[stock]]s an ammo charge, up to a maximum of 2. '''Kled''' will store ammo even while {{ai|Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard|Kled|mounted}}.

{{sbc|{{ai|Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard 2||Dismounted}} - Active:}} '''Kled''' sprays a cone of five {{as|pellets|buzzword2}} in the target direction, dealing {{as|physical damage}} while {{tip|dash|recoiling}} 250 units in the opposite direction.

{{as|Pellets|buzzword2}} collide into the first enemy they hit, and deal 20% damage per pellet beyond the first. Each {{as|pellet|buzzword2}} that hits an enemy champion or epic monster restores {{ai|Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard 3|Kled|Courage}}, by 5 and {{fd|2.5}} respectively.
q2.notes:
* The knockback from ''Pocket Pistol'' can be used to pass through terrain.
* Casting Q during Kled's dismounting animation will buffer ''Pocket Pistol'' to cast when Kled lands. Casting Q during Kled's remounting animation will fire ''Pocket Pistol'' normally.

effects.levelingtext: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|35 to 95}} {{as|(+ 80% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Maximum Damage|{{ap|35*1.8 to 95*1.8}} {{as|(+ 144% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
effects.str:
• Physical Damage: (+ 80% bonus AD)
  • Maximum Damage: (+ 144% bonus AD)

w1.name: Violent Tendencies
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Kled''' periodically enters a frenzy that grants him {{sti|attack speed|{{as|150% '''bonus''' attack speed}}}} on his next 4 basic attacks within 4 seconds after the first, with the final attack dealing {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}, capped against {{tip|monster|monsters}}.
w1.notes:
* The enhanced attack will apply other [[on-hit effect]]s and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal but the damage from Violent Tendencies is unaffected.
* As with most on-hit physical damage, ''Violent Tendencies'' bonus damage will apply {{sti|life steal}}.
* The base bonus damage will affect structures.

effects.levelingtext: {{st|Bonus Physical Damage|{{ap|20 to 60}} {{as|(+ {{ap|4.5 to 6.5}}% {{as|(+ 5% per 100 '''bonus''' AD)}} of target's '''maximum''' health)}}|Maximum Damage Against Monsters|{{ap|220 to 260}}}}
effects.str:
• Bonus Physical Damage: (+ % (+ 5% per 100 bonus AD) of target's maximum health)
  • Maximum Damage Against Monsters:

st_slices: (+ % (+ 5% per 100 '''bonus''' AD) of target's '''maximum''' health)

subeffects.title: Bonus Physical Damage
subeffects.str: (+ % (+ 5% per 100 '''bonus''' AD) of target's '''maximum''' health)

e1.name: Jousting
e1.target_range: {{tt|550|first dash}} / {{tt|700|second dash, center to edge, estimated}}
description: {{sbc|{{ai|Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard||'''Mounted'''|link=Kled#Mounted}} - Active:}} '''Kled''' and '''Skaarl''' {{tip|dash}} in the target direction, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies struck and {{tip|airborne|pulling}} {{tip|minion|minions}} and small {{tip|monster|monsters}} towards him. This cannot cross terrain.

Upon hitting an enemy {{tip|champion}} or large monster '''Kled''' and '''Skaarl''' {{tip|dash}} a fixed {{tt|200|estimated}}-units through them, marking them for 3 seconds and gaining {{tip|true sight}} of them. At the end of the {{tip|dash}} '''Kled''' gains {{sti|ms|{{as|50% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for 1 second and the ability to ''{{tip|dash|joust}}'' through the marked target again. This subsequent pass can cross terrain.
The mark will remain even if the target dies.
e1.notes:
* ''Jousting's'' second dash will end prematurely if '''Kled''' leaves the dash range or is dismounted.
* If '''Kled''' re-casts the ability at its maximum range, it will go on cooldown without activating.

effects.str:
• Physical Damage: (+ 60% bonus AD)
  • Total Damage: (+ 120% bonus AD)

r1.name: Chaaaaaaaarge!!!
description: {{sbc|{{ai|Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard||'''Mounted'''|link=Kled#Mounted}} - Active:}} '''Kled''' and '''Skaarl''' charge {{tip|unstoppable|unstoppably}} towards the target location, automatically navigating terrain along the way.

While charging, the duo gain {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} and {{sti|shield}} for every {{fd|0.25}} seconds of traveling, up to {{tt|{{as|950 '''total''' movement speed|ms}}|after movement speed soft caps}} over 3 seconds and {{pp|10|type=time traveling|key=%|label2=Shield Percentage|10 to 100|0 to 2.25|formula=('''maximum''' shield)/10*((time+0.25)/0.25). ''This is capped at 2.25 seconds of time active.''}} of the '''maximum''' shield amount over {{fd|2.25}} seconds respectively. The shield lasts for 2 seconds upon finishing the charge.

{{sbc|{{ai|Chaaaaaaaarge!!!||Mr. Kled's Wild Ride:}}}} The duo trails a directional draft in their wake, lasting 9 seconds, that grants {{tt|{{as|650 '''total''' movement speed|ms}}|after movement speed soft caps}} to allied champions who follow the duo's path.

'''Skaarl''' {{tip|dash|homes}} in on the first enemy champion encountered, {{tip|airborne|knocking them back}} {{tt|100|Estimated}} units and dealing {{as|physical damage}}, increased by {{pp|26|type=time traveling|key=%|label2=Damage Increase|0 to 200|0 to 4|formula=8% increase per 0.16 seconds. ''This is capped at 4 seconds of time active.''}}.
r1.notes:
* During the charge the duo gain:
** (950{{minus}}({{tt|'''current''' movement speed|after movement speed soft caps}})){{divided by}}12{{times}}(time{{divided by}}{{fd|0.25}}) {{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}} 
* The bonus movement speed is not affected by [[movement speed|movement speed caps]].
* The charge will not give any movement speed to '''Kled''' if he has more than {{tt|1440|Raw movement speed}} movement speed.
* The trail will not give '''Kled''' and his allies any movement speed if they have more than {{tt|840|Raw movement speed}} movement speed.
* All sections of the trail provide the same movement speed.
* Giving enough damage to make ''Kled'' dismount will cancel ''Chaaaaaaaarge!!!''.
* Enemies gain vision of ''Kled'' when he charges nearby.

effects.levelingtext: {{st|Minimum Shield|{{ap|20 to 40}} {{as|(+ 30% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Maximum Shield|{{ap|200 to 400}} {{as|(+ 300% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
